DOC.brief_title: Stress Management Intervention Caregivers Patients Undergoing Bone Marrow Transplant ( BMT )
DOC.detailed_description: Specific Aims - Further validate unique saliva collection device randomize control study psychoeducation , paced respiration , relaxation ( PEPRR ) intervention caregiver patient undergo bone marrow transplantation . - Evaluate suitability pace respiratory training use RESPeRATE™ caregiver . - Determine efficacy PEPRR intervention behavioral ( stress level , mood overall health ) physiological ( neuroendocrine function , immune function , sleep ) outcomes caregiver . OUTLINE : Caregivers randomize 1 2 group . - Group I ( treatment usual [ TAU ] ) : Caregivers patient attend 2-hour orientation class provide overview transplant process , information regard financial issue resource may available patient caregiver , review caregiver duty , dietary restriction post-transplantation , brief introduction stress stress management , hands-on training care central venous catheter . Patients also receive information form write manual provide in-depth information transplant , include transplant work , expect , caregiver duty , graft-vs-host disease , contact medical staff assistance . A voluntary 1-hour weekly caregiver support group offer inpatient BMT unit . - Group II ( psychoeducation , paced respiration , relaxation [ PEPRR ] ) : Caregivers patient attend 2-hour orientation class identical group I. Caregivers also participate PEPRR intervention comprise individualized stress management component educational component address psychosocial need caregiver . It also provide self-care adaptive coping skill . The stress management component address caregiver ' perception potential stressor ( primary appraisal ) ; perceive ability control manage stressor ( secondary appraisal ) ; ability exert control cope stressor ( cop effort ) ; ongoing evaluation stressor perceive ability manage stressor ( reappraisal ) apply cop strategy relaxation , prioritizing , goal setting , pace , communicate need . The PEPRR intervention consist 8 session ( 4 weekly 60-minute session follow 4 biweekly 60-minute session ) cover 100-day period caregiving post-transplantation . Caregivers also undergo paced respiratory ( RESPeRATE™ ) train 15 minute daily 12 week measure caregiver adherence compliance relaxation program . Caregivers patient undergo psychosocial assessment approximately 1-3 month prior randomization transplantation 1 , 3 , 6 , 12 month transplantation . Caregivers also complete questionnaire assess stress ( PSS , CRA , IES ) , mood ( POMS , CES-D , STAI ) , sleep ( PSQI ) , health ( SF-36 ) . Caregivers undergo blood saliva sample collection baseline periodically study biomarker analysis ( e.g. , neuroendocrine immune marker ) . Caregivers wear activity watch ( actimeter ) saliva sample collection period .
